:::: Foul Play 2013 Steam-Rip MULTi5-RG GameWorks ::::


::Information::


Release date : September 18, 2013
Genre: Action / Adventure / Indie
Developer: Mediatonic
Publisher: Devolver Digital
Platform: PC
Publication Type: License [Steam-Rip]
Language: English / French / Italian / Spanish / Brazilian Portuguese
Sound language: None / Not required
Tablet: Is present [RELOADED emu]


::Description::


Play as a demon hunter Baron Dashforth in a thrilling side-scroller, 
which is TOTALLY on the stage. Show us overcome and dramatic transformation! 
Enchants audiences combo attacks, invite a friend to accompany you as an 
assistant Scampwick, using all the tricks that you know to lead the audience 
into raptures


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows XP with SP3, Windows Vista / 7 / 8 
Processor: 3GHz Intel or AMD CPU 
Memory: 2 GB RAM 
Graphics: GeForce 6200 / ATI Radeon X600 w/ 256 MB 
Additional Notes: An appreciation of the fine arts 
and a bit of unbridled enthusiasm.


::Installation Steps::


1. Install by running setup.exe

2. Copy the contents of the folder NoDVD in the main game directory.

3. Play
